location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire from George Abraham

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has a hole in its text.

mods.abstract: Letter states that Abraham is leaving Schiras [Shiraz] and expects to arrive in Bushire in 5-6 days. Abraham states that he has advices of the utmost importance for the council in Bombay and requests for the Terribleor the Grabto wait for his arrival in Bushire before leaving for Bombay.
